revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Open Mesh |model=A62 |price=225 |est_release_date=5/2018 |fcc_date=06/12/2018 |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |type=outdoor access point |fcc_id=WT8DNWAP62 |ic_id=23500-DNWAP62 |pwr_poe=af, at, ns |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm |cpu1_model=IPQ4019 |cpu1_cspeed=716 |cpu1_cores=4 |ram1=256 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, |expansion_usb_num=1 |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm |wi1_chip1_model=IPQ4019 |wi1_chip2_brand=Qualcomm |wi1_chip2_model=IPQ4019 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=2 |flags=Wave2, MU-MIMO, IP55, 256QAM, |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac }}
:• 2x '''867''' Mbps - 2SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan.), :• 1x '''400''' Mbps - 2SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan., 256QAM) = '''''2100 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|Universal Tri-Band 802.11ac Wave 2 Cloud-Managed WiFi Access Point}} :{{ProductPage|https://store.openmesh.com/products/a62-universal-tri-band-802-11ac-wave-2-cloud-managed-wifi-access-point.html}} [https://store.openmesh.com/skin/frontend/rwd/default/media/ASeries%20Datasheet%20v3_3.pdf Datasheet] [[Open Mesh AP62]] is also covered by this FCC entry. The devices are identical, only named differently for marketing purposes. The ''Users Manual-Website contents'' document at the FCC says that 802.11n supports 256QAM so although Open Mesh only claims 300 Mbps 802.11n, it should actually support 400 Mbps. ===See also=== * [[List of Tri-Band Wireless Devices]]
